AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Revian Dark Templar
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a part of the higher echelons of the dark god's priesthood. Skilled with blades as much as [PAWN_pronoun] is with [PAWN_possessive] wits, [PAWN_pronoun] is as equally charismatic as [PAWN_pronoun] is dangerous.
